index.description: A comma-separated list of index names; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all indices

metric.description: Limit the information returned to the specified metrics

level.description: Report cluster state at cluster, index or shard level

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

flat_settings.description: Return settings in flat format (default: false)
